title: Education and Learning 1
sentences: está muy cerca de mi casa.
My school is very close to my house.
I study engineering at the university.
What is your favorite subject this semester?
I have a math exam next Friday.
I got a good grade on the history assignment.
The music teacher is very nice.
There are twenty students in my Spanish class.
I need to buy a notebook to take notes.
Can you lend me a pen? Mine doesn't write.
Llevo todos mis libros dentro de la
I carry all my books inside the backpack.
número diez está en el segundo piso.
Classroom number ten is on the second floor.
La profesora escribe los ejemplos en la
The teacher writes the examples on the blackboard.
I'm going to the library to study in silence.
I have applied for a scholarship to study abroad.
I want to get my university degree this year.
I have to study a lot for the final exam.
It is very fun to learn a new language.
My aunt is going to teach French at a school.
Great! I have managed to pass all the subjects.
I am sad because I am going to fail the exam.
We have to write an essay about the holidays.
I like reading science fiction books very much.
You can ask the teacher if you have doubts.
You must answer all the questions on the exam.
dictionary:
La escuela - The school
La universidad - The university
La asignatura - The subject
El examen - The exam
La nota - The grade
El profesor / La profesora - The teacher
El alumno / La alumna - The student
El cuaderno - The notebook
El bolígrafo - The pen
La mochila - The backpack
El aula - The classroom
La pizarra - The blackboard
La biblioteca - The library
La beca - The scholarship
El título - The degree / title
Estudiar - To study
Aprender - To learn
Enseñar - To teach
Aprobar - To pass
Suspender - To fail
Escribir - To write
Leer - To read
Preguntar - To ask
Contestar - To answer
La lección - The lesson
